content: More Crypto Silver Madness!! LOT 1: 2022 ETH American Silver Eagle blue colorized ICG MS68LOT 2: 2x 2017 BTC American Silver Eagle copper colorized ICG MS70/GenuineLOT 3: 2022 BTC American Silver Eagle gold colorized x2 ICG MS68/MS70LOT 4: 2017 BTC American Silver Eagle gold/ruthenium colorized x2 ICG MS69/MS69LOT 5: 5x 2014 Sol Noctis Binary Eagles**coins are blanks, they not loaded and do not have any hologram****Lot 2 and Lot 5 will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous auctions**STARTING BID PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0020BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: MARCH 12th, 2023, 15:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: DECLINE TO BE LISTED
